p.k: Around China stands out as a brand new TV program rolled out on the basis of 7 programs featuring cultural and entertainment themes of the CCTV-4 International Channel. From an inAprative perspective that touches on human cultures through the exploration of a wide range of cultures with distinctive local features, the Around China leads viewers into a fabulous world where they may have a full taste of the excellent personality of the Chinese nation and obtain an intimate understanding of its changes and evolution both in recent time and in future.
